title: Chad Consumer Price Index Cpi
description: Consumer Price Index CPI in Chad decreased to 118.40 points in September from 119.20 points in August of 2022. Consumer Price Index CPI in Chad averaged 106.89 points from 2015 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 119.20 points in August of 2022 and a record low of 99.80 points in December of 2016. This page provides - Chad Consumer Price Index Cpi- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Institut National de la Statistique du Tchad (INSEED)
